name: vog
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of air pollution that is a mixture of ash (= the soft grey or black powder that is left after a substance has burned) from a volcano, sulphur dioxide, and other gases: A layer of ash has been dusting the hoods of vehicles and other surfaces, and when the wind is wrong, the vog is thick. Short-term reactions to vog may include difficulty in breathing, as well as itchy eyes and a sore throat.
More examplesFewer examplesMany residents awoke to find their homes enveloped in a thick layer of vog yesterday morning.The volcano spawns acid rain and a type of bluish smog that volcanologists call vog, which can affect large swaths of Europe.Last week, light winds from the south allowed thick vog to collect over much of the rest of the Big Island and to drift up the island chain.
